roleset.name: to fuse or stiffen by ankylosis

example.name: Adjectival Usage--Do Not Tag!
example.text: The patient was suffering from ankylosing spondylitis.

example.name: Transitive/ Args 0 and 1
example.text: The disease had ankylosed his hips, reducing his mobility.

example.name: Intransitive/ Arg1 only
example.text: The patient's shoulder has ankylosed, and he no longer has free mobility in that joint.

example.name: Both args
example.text: For example, ankylosing of the spine from rheumatoid arthritis would be rated as 5002-5240.
